entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test plan for "file types" #60819
    C# 11.0
  • Code cleanup on save while resolving merge conflicts #60818
  • Quick action "Save to 'as' expression" does not add spaces around "as" #60817
  • Add constructor parameter fails with System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #60816
  • Symbol completion doesn't work on empty nameof in certain attributes #60812

Closed

  • Use Base Type Where Available refactoring #39905
    Backlog
  • Intellisense should not show GetType for span #38878
    Backlog
  • Completion list for generic constraints contains (and pre-selects) "where" keyword #30785
    Backlog
  • Recommender.GetRecommendedSymbolsAtPosition incorrectly assumes the input SemanticModel is in Workspace.CurrentSolution #60685
    17.3
  • Feature 'Find usages' is currently unavailable due to an internal error. #60132
    17.2
  • ""u8 should use singleton byte array #60643
    17.3
  • [LSP] Semantic tokens `isFinalized` property continually returning false on document open #59777
    17.2
  • "Extract Base Class" does not extract generic type parameters, causing errors in the extracted class #55871
    Backlog
  • Make inputting <see langword="null"/> more ergonomic and discoverable #60814

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix TypeScript code actions #60829
    Area-IDE
  • Add OptProf.json to CI excluded files #60828
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Exclude System.Text.Encoding.CodePages from OptProf #60827
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle unexpected keyword rather than identifier for lambda parameter name #60825
    Area-Compilers
  • [LSP] Implement support for `workspace/semanticTokens/refresh` notifications #60824
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Changed IDE0059 codefix title in pattern matching #60822
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Add file types to feature status doc #60820
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Do not suggest where keyword in generic constraints when accessing members #60815
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Update status of "Unsigned Right Shift" feature #60821
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Expose new Recommender API #60686
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix up handling for partially written generics #60789
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify the communication between the VS client and OOP further. #60787
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Extract base class extracting generic type parameter now (#55871) #60671
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Avoid artificial tagging delay when called by consumer that is explicitly blocking for results. #60830
    Area-IDE
  • API for exposing imports (including global imports) from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-approved
  • Add IDE tests for nameof(parameter) and mitigation for speculation issue #60802
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Initial .NET Framework ARM64 support #60735
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Apply 'require accessibility modifiers' setting on interface methods #60226
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Formatting options fallback and Document extensions #60803
    Area-IDE
  • Fill out test plan for auto-default structs #60688
    Area-Compilers
  • Relax requirements around second parameter of a user-defined shift operator. #60717
    Area-Compilers
  • Add new background analysis scope option for compiler diagnostics #60808
    Area-Analyzers
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
  • Fix generate event handler with invalid name (#59935) #60810
    Area-IDE
